title: Bug 114905 - Default value in list box of report parameter lost after modifying
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: No default value is set in the list box of the report parameter. The OK button can still be used after modifying the default value.
EB: The default value should be preserved in the list box of the report parameter even after modifying it. After modifying the default value, the OK button should become grayed out.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the report parameter settings. 2. Set the default value of the list box to 'aaa'. 3. Modify the default value to 'bbb'. 4. Check the list box for the default value. 5. Observe the state of the OK button.
